articles.title: US Stocks Dip As Powell Stays Cautious, Intel Climbs, Tesla Sinks To 11-Week Low: What's Driving Markets Tuesday?
articles.content: U.S. stocks edged lower as Fed Chair Powell signaled no rush to cut rates, keeping investors cautious ahead of the key inflation report. Intel jumped on AI chip optimism, while Tesla slid on weak China sales.

articles.title: Tesla Stock Is Having a Rough Start of the Year
articles.content: Elon Musk predicts that Tesla will be bigger than Apple, Nvidia, Microsoft, Amazon, and Alphabet combined due to a $10 trillion opportunity unrelated to its car business.

articles.title: Best Stock to Buy Right Now: Nike vs. Apple
articles.content: Nike's revenue growth has stagnated due to weak digital sales and North American business, while Apple's services ecosystem and cash reserves have helped it weather market challenges. Apple's stock is the better buy despite its higher valuation.
